description: This file defines API routes for inference operations within a FastAPI application, including an inference run endpoint and a placeholder streaming endpoint. It handles text processing, claim detection, search, and scoring by coordinating various imported services.

classes.name: SentenceChunk
classes.description: Data class representing a chunk of a sentence with claim detection flag.

classes.name: ClaimResult
classes.description: Data class representing the result of claim detection with associated evidence and scores.

classes.name: InferenceResponse
classes.description: Response schema containing inference results, including sentences, claims, and metadata.

methods.name: InferenceResponse run_inference( payload: InferenceRequest, response: Response, user: Dict[str, Any] = Depends(auth_required), label: Dict[str, Any] = Depends(label_context), )
methods.description: Endpoint to run the full inference pipeline: sentence splitting, claim detection, searching, scoring, and aggregating results.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] stream_inference( response: Response, user: Dict[str, Any] = Depends(auth_required), label: Dict[str, Any] = Depends(label_context), )
methods.description: Placeholder endpoint for streaming inference results, future implementation planned.
